content: the good thing about this pattern is you can stop any time just cast off loosely as soon as you re running out of yarn or when you think the shawl is large enough finishing weave in ends wash and block for the lace pattern to open up properly enjoy page 2 * birch leaf shawl © susan gutperl * susan@gutperl de construction a increases are worked symmetrical at beginning and end of every second row construction b page 3 * birch leaf shawl * 05/2021 © susan gutperl * susan@gutperl de 51 kvkkkokokkkwkkkokokkkvk 31 kkkkokokk\k/kkokokkkk 11 kkkokok\kkk/kokokkk 9 kkoko\kkkkk/okokk 7 kvkkkokokkkvk 5 kkkkokokkkk 3 kkkokokkk 1 kkokokk symbols k knit \ ssk or sl 1 k 1 psso / k2tog o yo yarn over w sl 1 k2tog pass slip_stitch v increase knit in front and back of stitch repeats inside black outlined boxes are worked only once at beginning and and of row repeats inside dotted boxes are worked repeatedly as the piece grows purl across back side of work knitter symbols fonts used courtesy knitter s magazine copyright © 1998 xrx increase no tsac increases are worked at beginning of every second row only which creates an asymmetrical pattern 93 kvkkkokokkkwkkkokokkkwkkkokk 73 kkkkokokk\k/kkokokk\k/kkokk 53 kkkokok\kkk/kokok\kkk/kokk 33 kkoko\kkkkk/oko\kkkkk/okk 13 kvkkkokokkkwkkkokokkk\k 92 kkkkokokk\k/kkokokk\kk 72 kkkokok\kkk/kokok\kkk 52 kkoko\kkkkk/oko\kkkk 32 kvkkkokokkkwkkkokk 12 kkkkokokk\k/kkokk 91 kkkokok\kkk/kokk 71 kkoko\kkkkk/okk 51 kvkkkokokkk\k 31 kkkkokokk\kk 11 kkkokok\kkk 9 kkoko\kkkk 7 kvkkkokk 5 kkkkokk 3 kkkokk 1 kkokk
